sentences.en: As a precautionary measure repeat the medication.
sentences.cn: 作为预防性措施，请重复用药。

sentences.en: Check that any medication you're taking carries no risk for your developing baby.
sentences.cn: 仔细检查，确保你所服用的任何药物不会对胎儿造成危险。

sentences.en: He antidoted the poison with quick medication.
He was epileptic and refused to take medication for his condition.
sentences.cn: 他患有癫痫，但是拒绝服药治疗。

sentences.en: He was still taking some medication which slowed him down.
sentences.cn: 他仍然在服用能够让他放松下来的药物。

sentences.en: It is better to sleep naturally, without taking medication.
sentences.cn: 最好是不服用药物自然入睡.

sentences.en: It is probable that the medication will suppress the symptom without treating the condition.
sentences.cn: 这种药物有可能治标不治本。

sentences.en: It really is best to manage without any medication if you possibly can.
sentences.cn: 如果你不服用任何药物就能挺过去的话，最好不过了。

sentences.en: Many of the elderly are on medication.
sentences.cn: 许多老年人都需按时服药。

sentences.en: The medication should ease the suffering.
The quick recovery was truly in response to medication.
sentences.cn: 这次迅速康复确实是对药物治疗的反应.

sentences.en: What is the best medication for this condition?
When somebody comes for treatment I always ask them if they are on any medication.
sentences.cn: 有人来治疗时，我总是会问他们是否在服药。

sentences.en: With medication, life at home goes on as usual.
sentences.cn: 接受药物治疗后，家里的生活还能一切如常。
